noPermission.description_embed: You do not have permission to use this command!

messageChannel.modalTitlePlaceHolder: Enter the title for the ticket
messageChannel.modalDescriptionPlaceHolder: Message to be sent in the ticket channel

selectTicketChannel.description_embed: Select the channel where you want to send the ticket initialization message, where users can open their tickets.
selectTicketChannel.description_embed_two: You have initiated the process of creating the **Ticket System**, we have created the channel {0} for you, follow there for configuration.

errorDb.description_embed: We encountered a problem, please try again.

selectCategoryTicket.description_embed: Select now the category in which the tickets will be opened.

selectTranscriptTicket.description_embed: Select now the channel where the ticket transcripts will be sent.

endSetupTicket.description_embed: You have successfully completed the setup of the **Ticket System**, now add your components (buttons) that will allow users to submit tickets.
